TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MyGroupCollectionAttribute extends System.Attribute

remarks.format:
## Remarks This attribute supports `My.Forms` and `My.WebServices` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.
When this attribute is put on a class, the compiler fills that class with properties corresponding to all the types in the project that derive from the type specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyGroupCollectionAttribute.MyGroupName%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: public MyGroupCollectionAttribute (string typeToCollect, string createInstanceMethodName, string disposeInstanceMethodName, string defaultInstanceAlias);
.method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string typeToCollect, string createInstanceMethodName, string disposeInstanceMethodName, string defaultInstanceAlias) cil managed

Docs.param: `String`. Initializes the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyGroupCollectionAttribute.MyGroupName%2A> property. The compiler generates accessor properties for classes that derive from this type.
`String`. Initializes the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyGroupCollectionAttribute.CreateMethod%2A> property. Specifies the method in the class that creates the type's instances.
`String`. Initializes the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyGroupCollectionAttribute.DisposeMethod%2A> property. Specifies the method in the class that disposes of the type's instances.
`String`. Initializes the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyGroupCollectionAttribute.DefaultInstanceAlias%2A> property. Specifies the name of the property that returns the default instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This attribute supports `My.Forms` and `My.WebServices` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.
When this attribute is put on a class, the compiler fills that class with properties corresponding to all the types in the project that derive from the type specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyGroupCollectionAttribute.MyGroupName%2A> property.

Docs.value: Specifies the method in the class that creates the type's instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property supports `My.Forms` and `My.WebServices` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Docs.value: Specifies the name of the property that returns the default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property supports `My.Forms` and `My.WebServices` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Docs.value: Specifies the method in the class that disposes of the type's instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property supports `My.Forms` and `My.WebServices` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Docs.value: Specifies the name of the type for which the compiler generates accessor properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property supports `My.Forms` and `My.WebServices` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.
